table.caption: Description of configuration options for testing

tr.td: (ListOpt) Modules of exceptions that are permitted to be recreatedupon receiving exception data from an rpc call.

(StrOpt) Enable eventlet backdoor. Acceptable values are 0, <port> and <start>:<end>, where 0 results in listening on a random tcp port number, <port> results in listening on the specified port number and not enabling backdoorif it is in use and <start>:<end> results in listening on the smallest unused port number within the specified range of port numbers. The chosen port is displayed in the service's log file.
(BoolOpt) If True, skip using the queue and make local calls
(BoolOpt) If passed, use fake network devices and addresses
(BoolOpt) If passed, use a fake RabbitMQ provider
(ListOpt) List of modules/decorators to monkey patch
